messages.title: Supporting Theresa May in Providing the Leadership the Country Needs
messages.content: Theresa May provides the leadership the United Kingdom needs to embrace the opportunities of the future. Jeremy will support the Prime Minister in delivering her vision of a safe, secure and prosperous country. We will continue to build on our economic success, to invest in our vital public services and create an economy that works for all. Theresa May and her team will deliver a BREXIT that works for Britain.

messages.title: A Strong Voice for You, Delivering for Horsham
messages.content: Whether fighting a second runway at Gatwick, standing up for the interests of rail passengers, championing investment in the infrastructure we need to match the growth in our population, Jeremy is a strong advocate for the Horsham constituency. Fighting on your behalf in Westminster or bringing decision-makers to Horsham to hear your views, Jeremy champions causes that matter to local people.

messages.title: Working Hard All Year Round
messages.content: Through his active engagement with local organisations and numerous visits to local schools, businesses and charities Jeremy has built a reputation for being approachable, available and committed to serving local people. Through ‘surgeries’ held in Horsham and throughout the constituency and his regular contact in places from Ashington to Balcombe and Shipley to Copthorne Jeremy has enjoyed being able to help a great many constituents. He loves being deeply involved in our community—and doesn’t intend to change!
